and I'm excited about working with both him and Sergey Brin for a long time to come." " Eric Schmidt has clearly done an outstanding job leading Google for the last decade," adds Larry Page . The results speak for themselves. There is no other CEO in the world that could have kept such headstrong founders so deeply involved and still run the business so brilliantly. Eric Schmidt is a tremendous leader, and I have learned innumerable lessons from him. His advice and efforts will be invaluable to me as I start in this new role. Google still has such incredible opportunity; we are only at the beginning, and I can't wait to get started.
